cinematic_overlays.name: vignette
cinematic_overlays.impact: Focusses attention on the center, adds a premium film look, and hides distracting edges.

cinematic_overlays.name: letterbox
cinematic_overlays.impact: Creates a 21:9 cinematic feel by adding black bars at the top and bottom.
cinematic_overlays.best_for: Storytelling, dramatic reveals, and high-production value ads.

cinematic_overlays.name: grain
cinematic_overlays.impact: Adds a subtle film texture to digital footage, making it feel more 'organic' and less 'clinical'.
cinematic_overlays.best_for: Vintage, street-style, or high-end lifestyle content.

text_animations.name: spring_scale
text_animations.impact: The text 'pops' in with a natural bounce using spring physics.
text_animations.best_for: Energetic calls to action, price reveals, and exciting hooks.

text_animations.name: spring_up
text_animations.impact: Text slides up from the bottom with a elastic bounce.
text_animations.best_for: Subtitles, key features, and information that needs to 'land' softly but firmly.

text_animations.name: blur_reveal
text_animations.impact: Text emerges from a cloud of blur into sharp focus.
text_animations.best_for: Dreamy, high-end cinematic titles, or emotional storytelling.

text_animations.name: typewriter
text_animations.impact: Characters appear one by one like a mechanical typewriter.
text_animations.best_for: Narration, factual statements, or tech-inspired scenes.

visual_effects.name: ken_burns
visual_effects.impact: A slow panning and zooming effect on static images.
visual_effects.best_for: Bringing life to photos, creating a sense of history or focus.

visual_effects.name: glitch
visual_effects.impact: Digital artifacts and color shifts for a high-energy, modern look.
visual_effects.best_for: Fast-paced hooks, technical disruptions, or 'edgy' street content.

visual_effects.name: bw_filter
visual_effects.impact: Turns footage into black and white with high contrast.
visual_effects.best_for: Flashbacks, dramatic emphasis, or high-fashion elegance.

visual_effects.name: zoom_in
visual_effects.impact: A steady zoom towards the center of the frame.
visual_effects.best_for: Creating a sense of intimacy or increasing the 'stakes' of a shot.

artistic_guidelines.pacing: Fast cuts (1-2s) for high energy. Slow transitions (3-5s) for emotional or technical explanations.
artistic_guidelines.color_theory: Use vibrant colors for hooks. Use muted, high-contrast grays for technical specifications to look 'premium'.
artistic_guidelines.trimming: Native trimming (startFrom) is preferred for short segments to maintain speed. Physical FFmpeg trimming is reserved for extracting moments from very large master files.
